entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
